body_html:
Ok, here i am again...
TensorDeviceSycl.h:163:19: error: no matching member function for call to 'get_access'

Build fails here, last ComputeCpp 1.0.1.
As far as i have understood this is caused by a mismatch in the SYCL interface which got updated recently... but i don't know how to proceed more.

I have restarted from a new clone, no possibilities bazel cache was messed up!
Meanwhile i have a 2nd machine i have started from scratch with ubuntu 16.04 and AmdGpu 17.50 you provided. Going to start the build in minutes, hopefully this will work.

Anyway this is the main error that occurs and prevents the installation on Ubuntu 18.04 too.

body:
Ok, here i am again...
TensorDeviceSycl.h:163:19: error: no matching member function for call to 'get_access'

Build fails here, last ComputeCpp 1.0.1.
As far as i have understood this is caused by a mismatch in the SYCL interface which got updated recently... but i don't know how to proceed more.

I have restarted from a new clone, no possibilities bazel cache was messed up!
Meanwhile i have a 2nd machine i have started from scratch with ubuntu 16.04 and AmdGpu 17.50 you provided. Going to start the build in minutes, hopefully this will work.

Anyway this is the main error that occurs and prevents the installation on Ubuntu 18.04 too.
